p: In Eq. 12, n designates a particular structure, whereas n−1 and n+1 are the structures before and after structure n in the reaction chain, respectively. Reactions in the backwards direction are indicated by a minus sign (e.g., k - n ). By solving this set of equations, one obtains the steady state coverage of the various intermediates. For a more detailed description of the model, see Supplementary Note 5.
